name: get_user_media_by_user_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_looter.
Tool description: Access Instagram Data with Precision and Speed! Utilize Intelligent Request Filtering for Guaranteed 99.99% Response.
API description: Fetches Instagram user media based on the provided user ID using the specified RapidAPI key.

count.description: The number of media posts to retrieve.

is_id.description: The Instagram user ID for which to fetch media.

end_cursor.description: The cursor for pagination to fetch the next set of media posts. Defaults to None.
